context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

seek assistance from charitable organizations or foundations that help with medical costs

consider applying for medical financial assistance programs offered by government bodies, pharmaceutical companies, or non-profit organizations
start a fundraising campaign to solicit donations for his wife's medications
seek financial help from friends and family, apply for a healthcare grant or loan, or request a payment plan from the hospital or pharmacy

reach out to the pharmaceutical company that manufacture the medication and explains the situation, as some companies can provide medications at a reduced cost or free of charge for those with financial hardships
apply for financial aid, set up a crowdfunding campaign, or negotiate the price with the medical company

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.

call a taxi, Uber or a friend to pick him up, or he could use public transportation if it is available and efficient in his city
call a cab or use a ridesharing service like Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport as quickly as possible

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.

generation: email or call her mother and ask if she can bring the assignment to school, if time permits

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: start a fire not only for warmth but it could also act as a signal to the rescue crew
start rationing their remaining food and water to make it last longer
start rationing the food and water supply among themselves
start rationing the remaining food and water among the group until rescue arrives
start by building a shelter using the available resources like branches, leaves, and snow to protect the group from the elements
create a survival plan
build a temporary shelter for protection from the elements
create a signal for help
start a fire for warmth and to signal for help
start making preparations to survive until help arrives
